name: Compact Cat Door for Window,Fits 27"-32" Width Windows,Quick Install with No Damage,Aluminum Frame Pet Door for Window,Cat Window Door Insert with Tight Seal,4 Lock Modes to Control Pet Access
short_description: Damage-Free Installation: Our pet door for window lets your pet go in/out freely,so you won’t waste time opening doors for them.It’s easy to install and won’t damage walls or windows—perfect for renters or anyone who wants to keep their decor looking great.

Plus, it comes with free foam cushioning strips and vinyl weatherstripping for better performance.

Pre-Purchase Essentials: Fits windows 27–32 inches wide; cat-accessible area: 7.7"W × 8.6"H, frame height: 12.9". Measure window width as instructed first—wrong size means the door won’t work. For special windows, message us online; we’ll send a solution in 24 hours.

You can conveniently control your cat’s access anytime—providing your cat with a certain degree of freedom while ensuring safety and preventing unwanted animals from entering.

After-Sales Service:​This cat door for window is built to last: aluminum frame for stability, rigid plastic flap that stays like-new, and clear glass for a good view. And you can remove/reinstall it quickly—great for deep cleans or moving! We back it with a 3-year after-sales service—message us with questions, and we’ll help.
